article_title: North Korea Cyber Attack on Sony—No Evidence, but Plenty of Capabilities
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

Email address

article_metadata.description: The FBI declared that there is no evidence of North Korean involvement in cyber attack on Sony, but sources say that Pyongyang remains a suspect.
